name: Stateduino
body:
### StateDuino
StateDuino is a DSL to describe separate StateMachines running next to each other in an embedded device.
Normally this requires a lot of manual (repetitive) code, so we created a DSL to generate this code.
tagline: An DSL for the state managing in an Arduino application
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
